name: Grand Admiral Thrawn (V)
Lore: 'The last remaining Grand Admiral. Found legendary Katana fleet of missing dreadnaughts. Military genius. Master of unorthodox tactics. Passionate collector of art. Leader.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Your [Independent Starship] starships are lost.  During your turn, if at a system, may deploy a Dreadnaught here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle (or retrieve a Dreadnaught).  Once per turn, if opponent''s alien at same or related location, may peek at opponent''s hand.(Original concept by Nick Kolnik - PC Volunteer Award 2006)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
